mapper.select: SELECT sum(if (f.praise_state =${@com.hpl.article.enums.PraiseStateEnum@PRAISE.code}, 1, 0)) as praiseCount, sum(if (f.collection_state =${@com.hpl.article.enums.CollectionStateEnum@COLLECTION.code}, 1, 0)) as collectionCount, avg(r.`cnt`) as readCount FROM read_count as r left join user_foot as f on f.document_id = r.document_id and f.document_type = r.document_type WHERE r.document_type = ${@com.hpl.article.enums.DocumentTypeEnum@ARTICLE.code} AND r.document_id = #{articleId}

SELECT sum(if (f.praise_state =${@com.hpl.article.enums.PraiseStateEnum@PRAISE.code}, 1, 0)) as praiseCount, sum(if (f.collection_state =${@com.hpl.article.enums.CollectionStateEnum@COLLECTION.code}, 1, 0)) as collectionCount FROM user_foot as f WHERE f.document_type = ${@com.hpl.article.enums.DocumentTypeEnum@ARTICLE.code} AND f.document_user_id = #{userId}

SELECT sum(if (f.praise_state =${@com.hpl.article.enums.PraiseStateEnum@PRAISE.code}, 1, 0)) as praiseCount, sum(if (f.collection_state =${@com.hpl.article.enums.CollectionStateEnum@COLLECTION.code}, 1, 0)) as collectionCount, sum(if (f.read_state =${@com.hpl.article.enums.ReadStateEnum@READ.code}, 1, 0)) as readCount, sum(if (f.comment_state =${@com.hpl.article.enums.CommentStateEnum@COMMENT.code}, 1, 0)) as commentCount FROM user_foot as f
